title: Deals: AirTags 4-pack for $65, Apple Watch 10 for $299, AirPods 4 for $99

Let’s check them out. AirTags are very useful personal trackers that have myriad uses from keeping an eye on your dog, cat, luggage, backpack, ... Read More
author: OSXDaily
excerpt: Amazon is back with some more great deals on Apple products, beginning with a big discount on AirTags, Apple Watch Series 10, AirPods 4, AirPods Pro 2, and Apple Pencil Pro. Let’s check them …
text: Amazon is back with some more great deals on Apple products, beginning with a big discount on AirTags, Apple Watch Series 10, AirPods 4, AirPods Pro 2, and Apple Pencil Pro. Let’s check them out. AirTags are very useful personal trackers that have myriad uses from keeping an eye on your dog, cat, luggage, backpack, purse, car keys, package, bike, or just about whatever else you might want to track with the Find My network. With an AirTag 4-pack coming in at just $65 ($16 per AirTag), this is quite a deal, down from the $99 retail price. Try them out yourself! AirTags – 4-pack – $65 (down from $99) Apple Watch Series 10 – $299 (down from $399) Apple Watch Series 10 features an always-on 42mm display, sleep tracking, fitness tracking, activity tracking, step counter, heart rate monitor, ECG, crash detection with emergency SOS, fall detection with emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, water resistance, all day battery life, voice control, pinch gestures, Siri commands, and more. Check out the various color and band options, and enjoy the discounted price. Get Apple Watch Series 9 for $299 (down from $399 MSRP) AirPods 4 – $99 (down from $129) AirPods 4 are incredibly popular wireless headphones with their iconic style and rich features, including gesture support, Spatial Audio, voice isolation, water and sweat resistance, Siri commands, and a USB-C charging case. Get AirPods 4 for $99 (down 22% from $129) AirPods Pro 2 with Hearing Aid Functionality – $169 (down from $249) AirPods Pro 2 have hearing aid functionality, active noise cancellation, high fidelity sound, water and sweat resistance, active noise cancellation, Spatial Audio, custom fit, transparency mode, eat detection, a USB-C charging case, and more. AirPods Pro 2 – $169 (down from $249) Apple Pencil Pro – $99 (down from $129) Apple Pencil Pro is a fantastic addition to a compatible iPad, bringing gestures, haptics, magnetic attachment and charging, and super easy pairing. The big thing to remember with the twelve thousand different iPads and Apple Pencil models is compatibility, since Apple didn’t make them all universally compatible, and in the case of Apple Pencil Pro it is compatible with iPad Pro 13-inch (M4), iPad Air 13-inch (M2), iPad mini (A17 Pro), iPad Pro 11-inch (M4), iPad Air 11-inch (M2). This is a popular iPad accessory, and right now Amazon is taking $30 off the retail price bringing it down to just $99. Apple Pencil Pro – $99 (down from $129) FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running.
html:
Amazon is back with some more great deals on Apple products, beginning with a big discount on AirTags, Apple Watch Series 10, AirPods 4, AirPods Pro 2, and Apple Pencil Pro. Let’s check them out.

AirTags are very useful personal trackers that have myriad uses from keeping an eye on your dog, cat, luggage, backpack, purse, car keys, package, bike, or just about whatever else you might want to track with the Find My network. With an AirTag 4-pack coming in at just $65 ($16 per AirTag), this is quite a deal, down from the $99 retail price. Try them out yourself!

  • AirTags – 4-pack – $65 (down from $99)

Apple Watch Series 10 – $299 (down from $399)

Apple Watch Series 10 features an always-on 42mm display, sleep tracking, fitness tracking, activity tracking, step counter, heart rate monitor, ECG, crash detection with emergency SOS, fall detection with emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, water resistance, all day battery life, voice control, pinch gestures, Siri commands, and more. Check out the various color and band options, and enjoy the discounted price.

  • Get Apple Watch Series 9 for $299 (down from $399 MSRP)

AirPods 4 – $99 (down from $129)

AirPods 4 are incredibly popular wireless headphones with their iconic style and rich features, including gesture support, Spatial Audio, voice isolation, water and sweat resistance, Siri commands, and a USB-C charging case.

  • Get AirPods 4 for $99 (down 22% from $129)

AirPods Pro 2 with Hearing Aid Functionality – $169 (down from $249)

AirPods Pro 2 have hearing aid functionality, active noise cancellation, high fidelity sound, water and sweat resistance, active noise cancellation, Spatial Audio, custom fit, transparency mode, eat detection, a USB-C charging case, and more.

  • AirPods Pro 2 – $169 (down from $249)

Apple Pencil Pro – $99 (down from $129)

Apple Pencil Pro is a fantastic addition to a compatible iPad, bringing gestures, haptics, magnetic attachment and charging, and super easy pairing. The big thing to remember with the twelve thousand different iPads and Apple Pencil models is compatibility, since Apple didn’t make them all universally compatible, and in the case of Apple Pencil Pro it is compatible with iPad Pro 13-inch (M4), iPad Air 13-inch (M2), iPad mini (A17 Pro), iPad Pro 11-inch (M4), iPad Air 11-inch (M2). This is a popular iPad accessory, and right now Amazon is taking $30 off the retail price bringing it down to just $99.

  • Apple Pencil Pro – $99 (down from $129)

FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running.
